Resume.description: Completed highschool with a bachelor's pass in 2022.

Projects.name: Calculator
Projects.description: Developed a user-friendly web-based calculator application utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to perform basic arithmetic operations with a clean and intuitive user interface for enhanced user experience.

Projects.name: E-commerce Website
Projects.description: My final e-commerce website, Modest Elegance

Projects.name: To-do List
Projects.description: Created a dynamic and user-friendly to-do list application, allowing users to efficiently manage tasks with features such as task addition, deletion, and completion tracking.

Projects.name: Area of Triangle Calculator
Projects.description: Calculates the area of a triangle, showcasing my skill level in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

Projects.name: Age to Days Calculator
Projects.description: A calculator that transforms your age into days.

Testimonials.name: Haanim Pietersen
Testimonials.message: Ammara Hoosen is a kind, hardworking and intelligent student and friend. She is a good team player and is good at helping anyone when they have a problem. She also has a kind heart and treats everyone the same with respect and love. I would recommend her if you are looking for someone that works well with designing websites and helping it gain loads of attention from all crowds.-Colleague

Testimonials.name: Chrishano Burns
Testimonials.message: Ammara is honestly a great person to have besides when it comes to coding. Her passion and desire to work hard and get things done inspire everyone around us. A skillful woman with such an intelligent mind has boosted everyone with happiness and her quick learning has helped a lot of us.-Colleague

Testimonials.name: Eighton-Lee Paulse
Testimonials.message: Ammara is not only a genuinely kind person but also an exceptionally dedicated and hardworking individual. Her clear sense of purpose in life is truly inspiring, and her work ethic is second to none. I wholeheartedly recommend her as a developer.-Colleague

Testimonials.name: Kelsey C. Oosthuizen
Testimonials.message: Ammara Hoosen is a great person with an amazing personality.She's is a great team player who works well with others around her. She's also kind, grounded and diligent. I would highly recommend her.

Testimonials.name: Heather Mtuedwa
Testimonials.message: Ammara is someone who is always looking for to enhance her skills and go the extra mile to learn different things, she is always dedicated to completing every task she gets on time and making sure she does it to the best of her abilities. Ammara is a great positive person to have around to motivate you and to help you keep moving forward. -Colleague

Testimonials.name: Matthew Dean Brown
Testimonials.message: Ammara is hardworking and always strives for excellence in her field of expertise. She is confident and works well in a team.I would recommend Ammara as she is a great asset to a team and will always help where she can.-Lecturer
